settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account preferences and privacy settings

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.chooseHow: Choose how you want to be notified about important events
notifications.smsDescription: Receive text messages for urgent updates
notifications.aiInsightsDescription: Get notified when AI analysis is complete
notifications.consentRequestsDescription: Get notified of new consent requests
notifications.recordSharingDescription: Get notified when records are shared

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.controlData: Control how your data is used and shared
privacy.saved: Your privacy preferences have been saved.
privacy.shareAnalyticsDescription: Help improve our platform with anonymous usage data
privacy.allowResearchDescription: Participate in approved medical research studies
privacy.publicProfileDescription: Make basic profile visible to healthcare providers

password.title: Password & Security
password.securityNote: For security, you must enter your current password to change it.
password.passwordChanged: Your password has been changed successfully.
password.couldNotChangePassword: Could not change password. Please try again.
password.currentPasswordIncorrect: Current password is incorrect. Please try again.
password.newPasswordMinLength: New password must be at least 6 characters

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.description: Export, backup, or delete your health data
dataManagement.exportDescription: Download all your health records and data
dataManagement.exportMessage: Your health data export will be ready shortly. You'll receive an email when complete.
dataManagement.deleteDescription: Permanently delete your account and all data
dataManagement.contactSupport: Please contact support to delete your account permanently.

accountActions.title: Account Actions
accountActions.description: Manage your account session and security
accountActions.abdmDescription: All settings and data handling comply with Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission guidelines for secure health data management.

prescriptions.title: Prescriptions
prescriptions.viewAndDownload: View and download your prescription records

profile.title: My Profile
profile.description: Manage your personal information and health details
profile.medicalInformationDescription: Important medical details for healthcare providers
profile.emergencyContactDescription: Person to contact in case of emergency
profile.privacySecurityDescription: Your data is encrypted and secure
profile.abdmCompliantDescription: Your profile follows Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission guidelines for secure health data management.
profile.dataEncrypted: All data is encrypted at rest and in transit
profile.accessControlled: Access is controlled through explicit consent
profile.revokeAccess: You can revoke data access at any time

consentForm.createDeIdentifiedConsent: Create a sanitized (de-identified) consent note for procedures and treatments
consentForm.deIdentifiedDescription: Enable to automatically redact patient name and MRN for privacy compliance
consentForm.title: Title
consentForm.consentDetailsPlaceholder: Describe the procedure, risks, benefits, and patient consent information...
consentForm.willShowAsRedacted: Will show as [REDACTED] in the form
consentForm.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields

landing.subtitle: Patient-Centric Health Management Platform
landing.description: Empower patients with AI-driven health insights and consent-based data sharing. Secure, compliant, and designed for the future of healthcare.
landing.welcomeBack: Welcome back, {{name}}! Ready to manage your health?
landing.welcomeBackUser: Welcome back, User! Ready to manage your health?

consentPrivacy.title: Consent-Driven Privacy
consentPrivacy.description: You control who accesses your health data. Explicit consent for every interaction, aligned with ABDM guidelines.

aiInsights.title: AI Health Insights
aiInsights.description: Advanced AI analyzes your medical records to provide personalized insights, risk assessments, and recommendations.

doctorCollaboration.title: Doctor Collaboration
doctorCollaboration.description: Seamless collaboration between patients and healthcare providers with secure data sharing and digital prescriptions.

healthTimeline.title: Health Timeline
healthTimeline.description: Comprehensive timeline view of your health journey with easy upload, organization, and retrieval of medical records.

interoperability.title: Interoperability
interoperability.description: FHIR-compliant data exchange between healthcare systems, enabling seamless continuity of care.

patientCentric.title: Patient-Centric
patientCentric.description: Built with patients at the center. Your data, your control, your health journey - managed the way you want it.
